summary: The diff removes the /coloring route from the router in frontend/src/App.tsx and removes the Coloring navigation link from frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx. However, the ColoringPage implementation file is not deleted (it still appears in the modified file list), and there is no evidence that Coloring static assets or all remaining UI references were removed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Delete the Coloring page implementation file frontend/src/pages/ColoringPage.tsx and ensure no remaining frontend code imports or references it.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows frontend/src/pages/ColoringPage.tsx is still present (listed under MODIFIED FILES) and there are no REMOVED FILES. Deletion is an explicit requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove Coloring-related static assets from the frontend project (delete the uploaded Coloring PNG and any associated Coloring PDF/assets) so no Coloring assets remain in shipped static files.
missing_requirements.reason: No assets are shown as removed, and the diff summary provides no evidence of deleting /assets/coloring/icoloring-9sd9.png or related Coloring assets.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove any remaining Coloring-related user-facing text, links, or references anywhere else in the frontend so there are no entry points or mentions of a Coloring feature in the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff confirms router and nav link removal, but provides no project-wide evidence that all remaining references to "Coloring" or "/coloring" were removed elsewhere (and the Coloring page file still exists).
